overview: As chief operating officer, Dave Johnson is responsible for iCrossing operations worldwide. Johnson previously served as executive vice president of North American operations, where he focused on building world-class teams to deliver solutions for iCrossing’s myriad clients. He was instrumental in the successful integration of several recent iCrossing acquisitions within the company’s delivery organization. Johnson has 14 years of experience in the interactive industry, partnering with such clients as HP, Grainger, Energizer, ABN AMRO, Federated Investors, Sargento, Motorola, LaSalle Bank and Hartmarx Corporation. Before joining iCrossing, Johnson founded an interactive agency, Digital Vision Communications, an interactive company specializing in website development and interactive marketing, which he later sold to Agency.com. Johnson spent more than eight years at Agency.com, establishing a strong service delivery system and an employee-focused culture as Agency.com’s North American President. He is on the membership committee for the Economic Club, and is a member of WOMMA and the Web Analytics Association. Johnson has a B.A. in Communications and Public Relations from Northern Iowa University.
